title: Synthesis, characterization and biological research of novel 2-(quinoline-4-carbonyl)hydrazide-acrylamide hybrids as potential anticancer agents on MCF-7 breast carcinoma cells by targeting EGFR-TK
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23495-23504
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03963G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hany M. Abd El-Lateef, Duaa Bafail, Noura Hamdi Yousef Alhalees, Eslam E. M. Toson, Ali H. Abu Almaaty, Elsherbiny H. Elsayed, Islam Zaki, Magdy M. Youssef
A sequence of novel 2-(quinoline-4-carbonyl)hydrazide scaffolds carrying the acrylamide moiety have been synthesized and evaluated for in vitro cytotoxicity against an MCF-7 breast cancer cell line.
